entry.title: Black Crepe Crown Back Satin Banquet Chair Covers
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2110
Type: Chair Covers
Price: 2.88

[About]

Quantity: 1 Chair Cover 
Material: High Quality Satin
Color: Black
Top to bottom Height: 40"
Chair Back: 25" height x 21" width
Chair Seat: 18" length x 18.5" width
Chair Legs: 19" height (from ground)
Note: Designed only for Crown Back Banquet Chairs.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Crown Back Satin Chair Covers

With the seamless luster of silky satin and durability of premium quality polyester, these splendid Crown Back Banquet Chair Covers will outshine the classiest of decorations. Give your plain banquet chairs and chair covers a stylish and elegant transformation with these high quality crepe chair covers.

Wrinkle-Resistant

Being highly wrinkle-resistant, these covers will make your party preparation time a breeze.  Simply unpack them and put on your chairs for an instant transformation. With such resistance against wrinkles and creases, these chair covers will save your ironing time too.

Durable & Multi-Use

Use these time and time again to highlight the sophistication of your special event without worrying about ironing and removing creases. Create a perfectly coherent party ambiance by pairing these seat covers with polyester sashes, Satin Tablecloths, Table Runners, and Napkins, backdrops, aisle runners, bows, flowers, and other decorations in your event’s theme colors.

 

Additional Information:

  • Stain and wrinkle resistant
  • How to care: Warm water wash. Low temp dry..
  • Uses : Party Chair Covers, Banquet Chair Covers, Wedding Chair Covers, Dining Chair Covers
